department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of a Bench Top Modular Pressure Calibration System
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires supply and delivery of a Bench Top Modular Pressure Calibration System for use in the Regional Calibration Centre (Pacific) at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
full_summary:
Government of Canada Bid Opportunity
=====================================

**Bid Title:** Modular Pressure Calibration System
--------------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking bids for the supply and delivery of a Bench Top Modular Pressure Calibration System for use in the Regional Calibration Centre (Pacific) at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON.

**Bid Details**

* **Notice Reference Number:** WS3555073605-Doc3734733596
* **Bid Tender Number:** W3555-233753
* **Bid Status:** Expired
* **Publication Date:** December 7, 2022
* **Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST

**Product/Supply Information**

* **Class of Goods or Services:** Measuring and observing and testing instruments
* **EU-GM Codes:** *41110000
* **Other Trade Agreement Provisions:** This bid is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements that call for this class of goods and services.

**Bid Objective**

The bid winner will be required to provide a bench-top modular pressure calibration system capable of providing accurate and precise pressure calibration for gases and chemicals.

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Duration:** From approximately March 2024 to March 2025
* **Delivery Terms:** The bidder shall ensure that the goods are delivered to the customers within the timeframe outlined in the bid documents
* **Notice Document Location:** The bid documents can be found online at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14838607?extsite=MTQ4Mzg2MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information**
Shaylan Stein, Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Place du Portage, Phase III, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
